   Republican National Committee
   stated on October 14, 2013 in a robocall:
   Says U.S. Rep. Debbie Wasserman Schultz "voted to cut off Florida’s
   veterans and their benefits."

true false
     * National

     * Republican National Committee
   Jon Greenberg
   By Jon Greenberg October 16, 2013

RNC says Wasserman Schultz voted to cut off veterans benefits

   The House of Representatives might not have been able to hold a speedy
   vote to end the shutdown but that doesn’t mean it didn’t hold lots of
   votes.

She voted to cut off Florida’s veterans and their benefits while the
   government is shutdown.

Our ruling

   The Republican National Committee said in a robocall that Wasserman
   Schultz voted to cut off benefits for veterans.
